Spider Nest

Spider Nest is a special area/dungeon level that appears in Remixed Dungeon. It was also the theme for a story contest that led to the creation of the Kusarigama weapon. The level has unique tilesets and contains special spider enemies.

Features

  • Populated primarily with various types of spiders
  • Includes special spider enemies with unique mechanics
  • Has unique tilesets (tilesets/tiles_spider_caves_xyz.png, tiles_spiders_nest_x.png)
  • Contains special loot related to spider-themed items
  • Water texture is water_spider_nest.png

Enemies

  • Spider Servants
  • Spider Guards
  • Spider Mind
  • Spider Exploding
  • Spider Queen
  • Spider Eggs
  • Spider Nest (immobile mob that spawns random spiders)

Items & Mechanics

  • Spider Charm - Item that summons friendly spider servants
  • Spider Armor - Special armor that provides immunity to webs
  • Spider Queen Carapace - Material item from defeating Spider Queen
  • Kusarigama - Weapon inspired by the story contest

Story Contest

The Kusarigama weapon was created as part of a story contest with the theme of Spider Nest, with the idea coming from Yuriy Frolov and implementation by Pavel Provorotov.

Strategy

  • Be prepared for multiple enemies at once
  • Understand the different abilities of various spider types
  • Manage space effectively to prevent being surrounded
  • Be aware that Spider Queen drops both Spider Charm and Spider Armor

Content Verification

  • Information source: Java Class com.nyrds.pixeldungeon.spiders.levels.SpiderLevel and related spider classes
  • Stats verification: Extracted directly from SpiderLevel.java and related classes
